mapper.insert: insert into carpool_booked (cp_bookedno,appli_id,writer_id,type,kind,appli_seat,carpoolno) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(cp_bookedno), 0) + 1 as cp_bookedno FROM carpool_booked) ,#{appli_id},#{writer_id},#{type},#{kind},#{appli_seat},#{carpoolno})
mapper.select:
SELECT cp_bookedno,name,c_start,c_end,type,kind,carpoolno, r from( SELECT cp_bookedno,name,c_start,c_end,type,kind,carpoolno, rownum r from(SELECT b.cp_bookedno,k.name,c.c_start,c.c_end,b.type,b.kind,b.carpoolno FROM carpool_booked b join member k on b.appli_id=k.id join carpool c on c.id=b.appli_id
name like'%'||#{word}||'%'
c_start like'%'||#{word}||'%'
c_end like'%'||#{word}||'%'
type like'%'||#{word}||'%'
kind like'%'||#{word}||'%'
ORDER BY appli_id ) )
where r>=#{sno} AND r<=#{eno}
